about.title: About Gotchipus
about.about: Gotchipus is an innovative AI-driven dynamic NFT (dNFT) pet companion project built on Pharos Network, deeply infused with DeFi logic and on-chain soul mechanics. Imagine a world where intelligent octopus guardians—your Gotchipus—emerge from the depths of the blockchain, awakened through stablecoin staking and AI-powered evolution. By staking stable assets, you summon these sentient sea creatures, forging a soul-bond that empowers them to grow, learn, and defend the lighthouse from the creeping darkness of the Abyss Rift.

mint.description: Mint your unique Pharos and join our collection
